data: Bradley Broadshoulders | Brad | Broad | Shoulders | Commander
Bradley Broadshoulders—friends called him “Brad”, or “Broad”, or “Shoulders”—stood grim-lipped, as is the custom of spacemen, and waited for the Commander to speak fateful words.
